name: Fidor API Demo
description: This application demonstrates the capabilities of Fidor Bank API powered by the `fidor_api` ruby library.

FIDOR_API_CALLBACK.description: The customer is redirected back to this URL during the oAuth flow

FIDOR_API_CLIENT_ID.description: The unique ID assigned to your application by fidor

FIDOR_API_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The secret assigned to your application by fidor

FIDOR_API_LOGGING.description: Whether the `fidor_api` gem should log all requests done against the Fidor API

FIDOR_API_ENVIRONMENT.description: The API environment which the `fidor_api` gem should use

RAILS_ENV.description: Runs the rails application in production mode

RAILS_LOG_TO_STDOUT.description: Tells rails to log to STDOUT instead of a local logfile

RAILS_SERVE_STATIC_FILES.description: Tells rails to service static files by the application server

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key used for different encryptions and checksums in rails
